DOCNAME: CASE OF OOO PTK `MERKURIY` v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - claim dismissed
TEXT: CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant company 's premises were expropriated and demolished . The applicant company sued ORG for compensation for the expropriated property . On DATE ORG of LOC allowed the claim and awarded it MONEY ( ORG , CARDINAL ) against ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE upheld the judgment on appeal . The judgment became enforceable .
CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiffs ' service opened enforcement proceedings . They were subsequently stayed at the debtor 's request until DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of ORG upheld the judgment of DATE in the final instance .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE stayed the enforcement proceedings until DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG challenged before a court the bailiff 's order to write the debt off its bank account . It also asked the court to stay the enforcement proceedings pending examination of the complaint . On DATE ORG of GPE granted the request for a stay of the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of LOC held in the final instance that the bailiff 's order had been lawful . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were resumed .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicant company received RUR CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . ORG , for a third time , applied to a court for a stay of the enforcement proceedings because it had no available funds . On DATE ORG of LOC allowed the ORG 's request and ordered a stay of the enforcement proceedings until DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant company and ORG concluded a remission - of - debt agreement . ORG undertook to pay the applicant company ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL by DATE . The applicant company agreed to make a charitable contribution of the outstanding amount of RUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL for the purposes of town development . The agreement continued as follows :

“ [ The applicant company ] undertakes to withdraw and not to resubmit the writ of execution no . DATE , issued pursuant to the judgment [ of DATE ] , and renounces all other pecuniary claims against ORG relating to the demolition of [ the applicant company 's LOC ] and to the circumstances established by the above court judgment . ”
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant company received RUR CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant company withdrew the writ of execution . On DATE the bailiffs discontinued the enforcement proceedings because the judgment of CARDINAL DATE had been fully enforced .
